mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_email, user_name, user_password, user_phone, user_zipcode, user_address, user_address_detail,user_address_etc,user_bank,user_bank_account) VALUES (#{userEmail},#{userName},#{userPassword},#{userPhone},#{userZipcode}, #{userAddress},#{userAddressDetail},#{userAddressEtc},#{userBank},#{userBankAccount})
mapper.select: select count(*) from user where user_email=#{email}
select count(*) from user where user_email=#{userEmail}
select * from user where user_email=#{email} AND user_password=#{loginPw}
select user_email from user where user_name=#{emailFindName} AND user_phone=#{emailFindPhone}
select user_password from user where user_email=#{pwFindEmail} AND user_phone=#{pwFindPhone}
SELECT user_pk as userPk, user_name as userName, user_phone as userPhone, user_bank as userBank, user_bank_account as userBankAccount FROM user WHERE user_pk=#{userPk} LIMIT 1;
